targets.query: host.hostname: $node_host AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/run* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/sys* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/dev* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/proc* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/var* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/boot

host.hostname: $node_host AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/run* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/sys* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/dev* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/proc* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/var* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/boot

host.hostname: $node_host AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/run* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/sys* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/dev* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/proc* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/var* AND -system.filesystem.mount_point:\/boot

matcher.options: Average system.memory.actual.used.bytes != null && Average system.memory.used.bytes != null ? params.used - params.actual : null

settings.script: params.actual != null && params.used != null ? params.used - params.actual : null

targets.query: elasticsearch.cluster.id: $cluster_uid AND metricset.name: node_stats AND elasticsearch.node.name: $node_name
